This beach is fun for kids to go look for sand dollars and a variety of shells.
Very uncrowded, and very clean. Preferred the ocean side to the bay side. Enjoyed watching the many windsurfers.

If you want a place to think and to wade, this is your spot. Lots of walking (if you dart through the tunnel) on the east side of the freeway (75)
This is a beautiful beach! We wish we could have stayed here longer and hope to return soon. This beach is great for couples or families.

Conveniently located, plenty of parking, clean. The bathrooms left much to be desired, though. Easily accessible to the hotel.
Great beach, although natural. Meaning, the state does not rake the kelp, etc. Not a problem, though
We went out during the April full moon and saw the grunion spawn. A very cool event in nature. Lots of small fish wash up in the surf to spawn on the beach.

Worth the drive to stop at Silver Strand, shorter walk from parking to the water's edge than the beach north of the Hotel Del.
It is about 5 miles south of the town so it is isolated. However it is a nice beach with nice sand. I don't think there are any concessions but I am not sure.

We were looking for a nice beach, not too crowded. This was just that. Restroom and showers, but not much else.

If you are looking for a beach for relaxing and enjoying the surf and sand, this is it. Not a lot of amenities, but the facilities are functioning and clean.
Nice sunny place near San Diego! Enjoy the beaches on the Coronade Island! Great views! Nice beach! An all around great place to visit!
